questions.q_game: Yay! Why do you wanna play High Adventure Pop Fantasy?
questions.q_nodnd: You don't wanna play D&D, you want to play something else
questions.q_hero: Every hero is special. What makes you special?
questions.q_fantasy: Sure, I like the classic fantasy races anyways
questions.q_special: Ugh, FINE. What makes you so damn special then?
questions.q_tiny: Nice! Wanna be human sized or tiny?
questions.q_silly: Alright, are you only a bit silly or extremely silly?
questions.q_dwarfy: Not done yet. Want to be slightly dwarfy, or nimble?
questions.q_tinker: You can be a woodsy trickster or steampunk tinkerer
questions.q_stronk: ...Sure. More of the Gentle Nature Giant or STRONK MEN
questions.q_less_classic: Sure, but we're getting less classic now.
questions.q_hills: So, are you hardier like the hills, or stronger like stone?
questions.q_nature: Wait, now it gets complicated. Is magic or nature more important to you?
questions.q_human_choice: PREPARE TO BE A HUMAN, HUMAN.
questions.q_monster_pretty: Alright. Are you half monstrous or half magical and pretty?
questions.q_dark: Seriously, you could just like, be a dark and brooding white dude
questions.q_animal_person: Wow, That's helpful. Is Animal Person weird enough for you?
questions.q_monstrous: Okay, well we got options. First off, are you actually kind of monstrous or just misunderstood?
questions.q_misunderstood: Alright, why do people misunderstand you?
questions.q_comic: Great! First off, how do you feel about comic relief?
questions.q_scales: Fun-sized evil it is. How do you feel about Scales?
questions.q_power: Right. Sorry. What is power to you?
questions.q_scales_kind: Like Ted Cruz. Neat. So what kind of scales we talking about?
questions.q_surprise: Surprise attacks, or face the enemy head on because you're not a coward
questions.q_conquer: But a bit of strength is needed too right? To conquer?
questions.q_weird: Are you just looking for weird for weird's sake at this point?
questions.q_uncommon: Uncommon Races! What sounds appealing to you?
questions.q_genie: Ugh fine. One of your parents is a genie
questions.q_psionic: Seriously? How about multiverse dwelling psionic plane hoppers?
questions.q_vulcan: Blue hairless vulcan perfectionists? Like, this isn't even DnD anymore
questions.q_experiment: OKAY YOU HAVE TENTACLES AND MUTATIONS AND YOU'RE LITERALLY A MAD SCIENCE EXPERIMENT
questions.q_element: Genies are elemental, so pick an element
questions.q_flavour: Not quite. Anyways Gith come in two flavours
questions.q_allway: Yup! Do you want to go part of the way, or all the way
questions.q_angel: More choices! What kind of angel?
questions.q_edgelord: Cool, we actually have those if you picked that path earlier you edgelord

answers.opt_nright: Wait, none of this is right
